This is Suman Adhikari

Techie and Fuzzy

  • Explore more about me.

DBA is my profession and Machine learning
is my passion.

An experienced and protean IT professional with 4+ years of industry experience in database (Oracle and MySQL) and UNIX administration skills along with programming skills over Shell scripting, Python, R, Pl/SQL, Java, PHP. Good hands on RDBMS upgardes, Patching, HA configuration (RAC, Dataguard, Extended-RAC), Backup/Recovery solutions, Performance Tuning, ASO (Advance Security). A committed team player, precise, self-motivated, quantitative and good interpersonal skills. Research oriented and explorer. In addition I am a machine learning enthusiastic, with practicing machine learning problem's in kaggle.


Specialties: Database Administration and programming, Shell Scripting, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Committed team player, Protean IT professional.
